revised_title: Elliptic Space Dynamics and Rigid Body Motion
tldr: This paper explores the motion of a rigid body in elliptic space, using non-Euclidean geometry concepts. The author demonstrates the duality and symmetry in elliptic space and extends the theory to solid geometry, kinematics, and the dynamics of a rigid body. The motion of a body is expressed in terms of six symmetrical angular velocities, and the theory of screws is also considered.
